Context:
The text provides information about mindfulness practice and its benefits, safety tips for guided meditation recordings, various ways to modify mindfulness practices based on individual needs, contact information for counseling services at George Brown College (letstalk@georgebrown.ca), and announcements for live meditation practices with specific counsellors named Nadia Stolpner and Heidi Mehta. - Benefits of mindfulness practice: reducing stress, improving focus, and wellbeing.
